Texto: 
n/a
as the patient was asymptomatic, no treatment was indicated.
non-enhanced virtual colonoscopy images demonstrate a soft tissue density mass within the right lower lobe.

intravenous contrast enhanced ct of the chest demonstrates a well-defined mass within the right lower lobe with an arterial supply arising from the abdominal aorta.  lung window images demonstrate no air-filled bronchi within the mass.

3d reconstructed image from the vitrea workstation demonstrates the mass within the right lower lobe adjacent to the right hemi-diaphragm.
pulmonary sequestration
pulmonary sequestration 
necrotizing pneumonia 
bronchogenic cyst 
diaphragmatic hernia 
rounded atelectasis 
neurogenic tumor
54 year old male with a right lower lobe mass seen on virtual colonoscopy.
please see factoid.
